name: Lakkaberry Krumkakes
effect:
Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20â€“30% for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
description: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The batter is put on a griddle and swiftly rolled up, while butter is added and fruits are sprinkled on top. Crispy, crunchy, and sweetly aromatic, it is very popular among children.

suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
suspicious.description: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The edges are soft from moisture, with a texture more like egg crepes than krumkakes. Fortunately, the center is still crispy. If scoffed down quickly, you should be able to avoid any unpleasantness...

normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
normal.description: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The batter is put on a griddle and swiftly rolled up, while butter is added and fruits are sprinkled on top. Crispy, crunchy, and sweetly aromatic, it is very popular among children.

delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
delicious.description: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The crispy egg rolls break apart in the mouth with a heavenly crackle, contrasting with the smooth, sweet filling inside. A juxtaposition of textures that come together in perfect harmony on the palate. Before the taste has had time to linger, the hand has already reached for another bite.
